Text: Re ISDA Notice and Amendment Cc Attached please find the form of Guarantee to be issued by TransAlta It is the same form we issued to Enron for physical power transactions If there are any credit concerns please call me at Maureen See attached file TAC to Enron NA re TEMUS ISDA doc Sterling Koch PM Embedded image moved to file picpcx To cc Katalin ransAlta Maureen ransAlta Subject REQUEST ISDA Notice and Amendment Please find attached our form of notice and amendment to the ISDA agreement between MEGA and Enron North America as successor to Enron Capital Trade Resources Let me know if you have any changes and we will forward executed copies along with copies of the Merger Certificates THX Sterling PS Our credit person is Maureen Piercey See attached file MEGA merger notice Enron NAdocSee attached file Enron NA AMENDMENT schedule blkdoc TAC to Enron NA re TEMUS ISDA doc picpcx MEGA merger notice Enron NAdoc Enron NA AMENDMENT schedule blkdoc
